name: LaserLink
description:
Become the Master of the laser with LaserLink and recover every diamonds in each level.

Create junctions to allow generating a laser between 2 points of connection of color in order to recover the diamonds ones.

But be careful, certain connections will not be able simply emit and not receive.

So that connection is validated, it is necessary that is completely completed apart from the points of connection of color, which them must be with the number exact of 2.

Your only means of action are to turn the flagstones while supporting above.

Certain flagstones cannot be rotated; they are represented with a lock. Other flagstones are explosive, and will destroy the flagstones around.

To gain the level, you must recover 6 diamonds in assigned time.

The current version includes:

• 40 levels with an increased difficulty and a pleasure of different play
• Ability to listen to your iPod music preferred while playing.
